about_the_game:
feature

▶ Proportional projection of CG background to draw map objects.

▶ Localized subtitles create situations that are most consistent with real-life dialogue and the      use of local dialects.

Story summary

Angel is an ordinary third-year college girl. Because she is usually too careless, it is difficult to find a job in a good NGO. She can only go to some unusual places for internships.And to make matters worse, because too many subjects were failed, she needed to retake them, could not even make up the normal working hours, so she had to agree to work as a "sex volunteer" for the organization to earn extra hours.

"At worst, it's just a handjob for people in need!" Angel thought simply.

However, what she doesn't know is that in the future, in addition to cases of applying for sex volunteers, there will be more people around her who will need her "services".

future plans

This is the first work of our team. It cannot be said to be very mature, but it is definitely 100% attentive.Because our team insists on providing plot descriptions that are most relevant to local culture, we do not currently provide multi-lingual subtitles due to insufficient team manpower and budget.

If we have spare capacity in the future, our team will work hard to provide more high-quality works and expand into other languages. Thank you for your support and understanding.

content_descriptors.notes:
This work contains nudity,incest,eroticism and sexual assault scenes and plot descriptions.

According to the grading system, if you are under 18 years old or under the local legal age,Or if you are consciously unable to accept similar plots, please do not play this game.

All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years old .
All characters and groups in this work are completely fictitious.

name: Lovely NGO

subs.option_text: Lovely NGO 愛愛性權關懷協會 - $8.99

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Angel is an ordinary third-year college girl. Because she is usually too careless, it is difficult to find a job in a good NGO. She can only go to some unusual places for internships.Later for some reason, she had to agree to work as a "sex volunteer" for the organization to earn extra hours.
